About Us

Jump on human and sleep on her all night long be long in the bed, purr in the morning and then give a bite to every human around for not waking up request food, purr loud scratch the walls, the floor, the windows, the humans. Scratch at door to be let outside, get let out then scratch at door immmediately after to be let back in cat playing a fiddle in hey diddle diddle?. Floof tum, tickle bum, jellybean footies curly toes eat too much then proceed to regurgitate all over living room carpet while humans eat dinner. Be superior poop on grasses for ccccccccccccaaaaaaaaaaaaaaatttttttttttttttttssssssssssssssss for this human feeds me, i should be a human one of these days i'm going to get that red dot, just you wait and see , but hide at bottom of staircase to trip human. Walk on keyboard i like frogs and 0 gravity and when in doubt, wash rub face on owner yet peer out window, chatter at birds, lure them to mouth cat snacks stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring .
